moves.1. Nh3: So off we go again in this themed opening
moves.1... d5 2. g3 e5 3. Bg2 c6 4. O-O: White has the king tucked away safely black has tried to take control of the centre
moves.4... Nf6 5. d3 Be7 6. f4: White weakens his kingside, black develops
moves.6... Nbd7 7. fxe5 Nxe5 8. Nc3 O-O 9. Bg5: The knights are well placed to cause problems for white
moves.10. Qd2 Bxg5 11. Nxg5 h6 12. Nf3 Qb6+: D4 is forced and this allows Nc4
Black stands better, and now must exploit the material advantage
moves.19... Qe7 20. Kf2 Re8: Black aims to control the e file
